item.title: LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE in Spark
item.description: For array type column, explode() will convert it to n rows, where n is the number of elements in the array. For map/dictionary type column, explode() will convert it to nx2 shape, i.e., n rows, 2 columns (for key and value).

item.title: Change Timezone in Databricks Spark
item.description: The Databricks cluster is using UTC as the default timezone. So when you run some time-related code, the displayed time is not the local time, which is not ideal. In this post, I want to share how to change the timezone setting for Databricks cluster.
